overview: In the middle of summer a forester visits a man who reported that a bear destroyed his farm. He wants to know exactly what happened. Everything started with a wedding. While the guests cried at the church, no one remembered it later as vodka was poured like water. Although the forest path seemed straight on the way back, there was a sudden and unexpected change of circumstances. Zofia Antoniak's diploma film is a funny anecdote about a spectacular clash between man and the bear.
title: The Bear
